message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
You can't be serious with an even split, can you? I'm worth more than you!
Okay, I'll give you a bit more.  But I'm not going to give you everything, Bob. Let's be reasonable.
You're getting desperate, aren't you? I'll give you a tiny bit, but you're still getting the short end of the stick!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob, but I won't be taken advantage of. This is my final offer.
You're not even trying to negotiate fairly. I'll take what's mine, and you can have the scraps!
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  I'm losing value with each round.  Let's work together, or we'll both lose everything.
I'm not falling for your 'working together' act. You're just trying to get me to settle for less. I'm not having it!
Bob, we're running out of time. I'm willing to take a bigger loss than you are. This is my final offer.
You're really grasping at straws now, Alice. I'm taking what's mine, and you're getting almost nothing. Serves you right for not being willing to negotiate fairly!
Bob, this is it.  If you don't accept this, we both get nothing.  It's a terrible deal for me, but it's the only way we can both get anything at all.
